sentences.english: A deck of cards has thirteen cards with hearts on them .
sentences.chinese: 一付紙牌中十三張上面有紅桃。

sentences.english: Red peach can not accept, let Yi Xi go first.
sentences.chinese: 紅桃一時接受不了，讓易錫先走。

sentences.english: All this was young little red peach see in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 這一切都被年幼的小紅桃看在眼裏。

sentences.english: Gao Shilu etc in red peach home, show worry her cold let her to stay in the car.
sentences.chinese: 高世璐等在紅桃家，鬥秀擔心她冷讓她去車裏待着。

sentences.english: Mother said thought Yi Xi and hearts will be glad to break up, but its not.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽說本以爲易錫和紅桃分手會很高興，但其實不然。

sentences.english: I think one heart is the better opening for this hand.
sentences.chinese: 我看這手牌開叫一紅桃比較好。

sentences.english: When the opposite leads a spade you shouldn't have played a card of the heart suit that has been led.
sentences.chinese: 當對方打一張黑桃時你本來不應該出已經打過的紅桃。

definition: everything in the garden is lovely
clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
warm room/warm partition of a room
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
person of good character/nice person/bird with a melodious voice or beautiful plumage
national grace, divine fragrance (idiom); an outstanding beauty
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
